Okay, now that we're here, let's get started, shall we? Here are the three main girls.

Kelly Green: The eldest of the girls at age twenty-three. She is loud and a little bit loopy, but a genuinely nice person. She is the only of the girls who smokes and drinks and has had sex, so she's a little more loose than the others. She suffers from depression. She is already a bit overweight, once saying her stomach has it's own orbit, but she is learning to appreciate her curves. This fair may be where she has a breakthrough.

Jessica Smithson: She is the middle of the group, aged twenty. She is the smart one, the honor student. She is athletic and dating, but she's still a tad on the chunky side. She's in college to become a nurse. She's slowly gaining weight already, and she's come to the fair to relax for the first time in months.

Carrie Smithson: Jessica's younger cousin. She's into the whole goth thing. She suffers from a milder case of depression. She's been through a string of boyfriends, yet ironically, she's studying to become a psychiatrist. She is a band geek, in the drum line. She's very sarcastic and surely, but a bit of a softie (inside and out). She's always wanted bigger breasts, and wouldn't mind putting on a few inches around the waist to get them.

Okay, them's the girls. Have fun and be careful with them.

12.content:
Jessica reluctantly forked over the twenty dollar entrance fee, and cautiously strode into the fair, immediantly regretting paying. There wasn't much there, only a handful of cheesy Carnival rides, a thick smattering of greasy food stalls, and the meandering guests, all of whom seemed a bit on the hefty side, and were nonchalantly munching on large, greasy, fatty snacks. Oh, and there was a large white banner, which decalred in bold red letters, 'All food free for patrons!!'
Great. Jessica had decided just last week that she needed to tighten up her diet. Her waist, while infintismal in comparison to most of the sloshing bellies around here, most of which appeared almost pregnant to term, was still too big for her liking. It was all her mothers fault, really. she had always insisted that Jessica eat all of her Fattening dinner, and unsuspectful Jessica had decided that a satisfied mom was a more freedom-allowing mom.
But then Greg had moved to town, just last summer. Greg was gorgeous, the most handsome guy in this hick-town by far, and at first he actually seemed to be interested in Jessica, and then came those awful words, Sorry, Jessica, but I like girls of a different...size"
all of a sudden her world came tumbling down on Jessica, those words turned over and over in her sleep, she barely ate, and went through almost a week in a stupor. then as quickly as he had come, Greg was gone, taking most of the hearts of girls with him, leaving only a promise to return.
that was when Jessica had made the decision to slim down as much as she could. she had taken to vigorous training, got up early every morning to run a quarter mile, and had breakfast before anyone got up, so her mother couldn't complain, typically she had only toast, or sometimes some leftover salad, she had immediantly declared meat and meat products off limits, they were too fatty,and then jogged to school. The fair was fairly new in town, it had arrived only a week after Greg left, and some of her previously slim friends had already started to bulk up. She focused on her classes, was rigorous in her work, and in gym she always tried to impress the couch, but he always seemed a bit too interested in his chips to look up at what the students were doing. Thus, Gym became more of a free period for most students, they were free to gossip, or quickly jot down last night's homework as they pleased. But not Jessica. She was always lifting weights, or climbing that big rope to the ceiling, or sparring with Matt.
Matt was the only other kid who didn't sit around, or harass the vending machine. They sparred all the time, but they never really tlaked. Most people assumed they were a couple, they talked about how Jessica and Matt were going to go off to the army together, and how they were the fitness-nuts in love. But that really wasn't the case. it was just that they happened to be the only ones on the jogging team. And they were the Basketball team. And almost all of the other recreational activities, consisted of either them, or nobody. All of them except Chess-club, which consisted solely of that geek, Arnold.
'but enough flashback,' Thought Jessica, 'I just need to get through this without ruining my figure, and when Greg comes back, it'lll all be worth it. and if I don't, all this training will have been for moot.'
and with that, she strode off, when something round and greasy bumped into her from behind, knocking her to the ground.
In a flash, Jessica was up and stood in karate pose, until she saw her assailant.
It was a childhood friend of hers, her name was Carla.
For as long as Jessica had known Carla, which was since kindergarten, Carla had despised fat. However, instead of excersising like Jessica, Carla just barely ate. She was Anorexic, to a degree that once, she had actually had to be hospitalized.
However, that apparently was no longer the case. Carla's waist, which was once so small, you could literally put both of your thumbs on her belly button and at the same time put your index fingers on her spine (which all twelve of her boyfriends had proven this year) was now stretched to the limit of her white T-shirt, which was coated in grease and sugar. All in all, Carla's gut was now the size of a bowling ball. in one slightly meaty hand, Carla held a fat hotdog, smothered in mustard, ketchup and relish,only a bite taken out of it, and the other grasped a large overfull, Quart sized soda, which contained what appeared to a thick brown milkshake, which Carla greedily slurped down, without really noticing.
"Carla?" Jessica gasped, not wanting to believe the sight.
"Hmm?...Oh, yeah...That's me" the girl looked blearily at Jessica, and then blinked, "Hey... Jessss...ca right?...the fit...ness-nut?... I never... expected to ...see you hear...HILP! scuse me...hope you enjoy it..."before Jessica could offer much reaction, the cup eminated a dry sound, and Carla stumbled away, almost waddling, to the nearest stall. Suddenly, she tipped back her head, and swallowed the remainder of the hotdog whole. her eyes closed with pain at the size of the object, but then she smiled lazily, and took the pretzel offered by the man in the stall. It was massive, almost twice the size of an ordinary one.
Shaking her head, Jessica walked off, and decided to get on a ride.

"Hey," someone said, "Girlie!"
Jessica turned around to meet the guy that spoke, but she didn't look him in the eye. All these people around, and the temptation to pig out, was making her nervous.
"yeah?" she shyly replied, and for the first time looked at him.
Some people would say it was love at first sight. Others would declare it hypnotism. And still others would mildly compare it to the way a Jaguar paralyzes her's prey, right before the pounce. Whatever the words you would string onto it, Jessica was right in the middle of it. She stared deeply into deep, dark, chocolate brown eyes, and could feel him looking back into her baby blue ones. Only for a second did she feel a slight chill. Only for a second did she notice the way his eyes drifted to her midsection, only for a second did she suspect the cold way he glanced at her, which was for barely a microsecond, like she was a pet, and not a favorable one.
"You look kinda hungry, here, take this. On the house. Er, tent." The boy offered her a small bag of fries. Jessica considered taking it; it was so tiny, and free, and he was hot, and apparently interested in her. Then suddenly she remembered, GREG. He was the reason she was on such a rigorous program, she had to become that size for him.
"No thanks, I'm on a diet. But thanks for the offer." Jessica tried walking off again, but the boy laughed,
"A pretty lady like you deserves a cheat-day. And the boss doesn't like it if we put food back."
Jessica considered it, but then an idea came to her.
"Why don't you just eat it. You must get hungry, standing there all day, watching everyone else."
His answer was quick, and coupled with a pained smile,
"We're kinda 'forbidden' from eating any of the food ourselves"
Reluctantly, Jessica took the fries, daintily nibbling on the smallest one.
"I suppose I could work off anything I gain from this," she commented as she munched
"That's the thinking," the boy said, eyes on her teeny midriff, "names Carl, by the way."
Jessica swallowed the fry, and was about to thank Carl when something happened

134.content:
"Excuse me! Yes, you! Pale, scary girl! Can you help me out?" Carrie's attention had been caught by a food service woman who waved her arm. "Geez. What did I do?" Carrie stuck her hands in her brown jacket pockets and traveled toward the commotion. "I've got so much. I feel like I've over prepared." The fair woman whined, clearly it had to be about the absurd amount of fair food she made. Carrie looked at the nacho buckets, fried candy bar baskets, triple dipped corn dogs. Yikes!

"God this stuff could kill a person just by looking at it," Once again her nose caught a waft, "Still. I paid a lot to get in and it's free." Her gothic eyes looked at the selection. The fair woman smiled at the notion that Carrie considered. "Just one of each item will be enough. Everybody who's had it said they're REALLY good." Carrie huffed, "If there were other people then why was I singled out like this?" she thought, "Has she been doing that to everyone? Anyhow, I might as well." Carrie grabbed the bucket of nachos drenched in an absurd amount of nacho cheese and a basket of fried candy bars.

The fair woman practically cried from Carrie's decision. "Thank you! Thank you so much! I just hate to see good food go to waste." Carrie opened her mouth to make a soul shattering remark in terms of the woman's hefty stature but kept her mouth closed. "Whatever."

"Mm. Not bad," spoke Carrie after a few nachos. The ratio between nacho texture and load of melted cheese is scientifically perfect. But, Carrie doesn't know that. Although, she beginning to learn how good this stuff actually is. Usually, nachos and cheese at a fair tasted processed to all hell. Clearly this stuff wasn't store bought. It had to be home made.

Carrie occasionally took a break from the nacho bucket to take a good chomp from the fried candy bars that tasted a lot less disgusting than they sounded on paper. The wonderful tastes of chocolate, fried dough, cheese and tortilla chip combined on her tongue wonderfully. The food would make for a wonderful journey down to her stomach. That would be until...

"I NEED A DRINK!" Carrie gasped, having trouble swallowing. Luckily for her a soda cart, piloted by an elderly man with a grotesquely round belly, stopped at her table. Without a word, the man poured a soda of unknown flavor (probably Cola) into a massive cup and placed it in front of her. Carrie didn't hesitate to guzzle down as much of the liquid as she could. "That's better." Carrie sighed before a burp flew from her mouth.

Carrie found her arm diving into the nacho bucket to discover it completely empty. Then the candy bar basket was empty. "Man. I got kinda crazy. But that food was kinda good. Gotta admit."

"Free Sample! Fried Butter Balls." A man dropped a basket of ten powder sugar coated butter balls. Carrie nearly picked the basket up and threw it at his head when-

"Chocolate coated bacon on a stick!"

"Donut burgers!"

"Ultra Cheese Curds!"

Carrie found her table being piled with foods she wasn't asking for. These carnie folk were practically tossing what they cooked in front of her. As much as she wanted to deny the free food, something kept her from leaving the table. Instead, her hands became greedy, grabbing as much food as they could hold and pressed them into her maw.

Not seconds later, Carrie could feel her stomach getting tight and strangely enough the clothes she wore felt a tad snug too. Something in her mind had forgotten her regard for herself and kept shoveling food into her mouth. "If I don't do something quick. I'm gonna be in a world of hurt!"

She saw no need for restraint in any sense of the word; if she needed to belch or fart, she let it out almost triumphantly. Along with her awe, Carrie was a bit afraid... mostly at Clara's sudden interest at Carrie's own belly.

From behind, a hand reached over to Carrie's mouth and shoved in the sloppiest, greasiest, biggest corn dog Carrie had ever eaten or seen in her life. As she swallowed, the corn dog seemed to hit her belly like a weight, and she swore her stomach swelled three inches.

"-HHHHHHHHHRRRRRAAAAAP!-" Carrie roared, her stomach suddenly downright full of gas. She behind to see the cheery face of Clara beaming back at her, holding a now-empty corn dog stick.

"What?! A corn dog?! I feel like I've eaten a full buffe-PPPPPPPPHHHHHHHHRRRRRRRT-!" Carrie blushed instantly.

The amount of food she was putting away was downright incredible, and thus a crowd had begun to form around her, some of the onlookers even getting food for her. Every time she cleared another large plateful, they cheered, some even betting when she'd quit and finally be full. Obviously, no one had won any bets yet.

She finished off a few fried chicken legs when a fair worker walked up to her. The worker had very long, pretty red hair, happy blue eyes, and a butt that was more like a shelf than anything. Her nametag read "Tracy."

"Um... miss..." Tracy began.

"Carrie." she said with a burp.

"Carrie. My, um, boss noticed all the attention you're getting for the fair and... wanted to know if you wanted a job."

"S-Seriously?" she sputtered. "I can even work like... this?!" she said, motioning to her loudly digesting belly.

"Sure! We have a uniform in back your size..."

142.content:
In the employee tent of the World Famous Rotund Brothers' Travelling Fair; beyond the animal tents, the rides, the food
stalls, and the puddles of spilled beer, four people were waiting very patiently. The first was a small, twentysomething
year old girl, dressed in overalls and covered head to toe in dirt. She ran a hand through her rough cut hair as she
watched the small television screen in front of her. "Damn," she said, "It doesn't look like nobody's comin' in today." The
TV was hooked to a camera trained on the entrance of the fair, and no one was on screen. "Thass bad," The girl continued,
"Today ain't gonna be no fun if we don't have anyone to play around with."

The second of the four spoke up. "Scum, what does that even mean? It's like you're not even speaking English." The second
person was a handsome young man in pressed dress clothes, half taking a nap off in the corner.

"You know!" Scum said, "People come 'round and we feed 'em and play! It ain't a tough idea. 'Sides, I haven't gotten a
nice, thin girl to fatten up in a long time..."

The third of the four turned his attention from the TV screen. A bald man in his mid thirties, about the size and shape of
a full grown grizzly bear, and clad in white clothes and a stained apron. He spoke in a deep but quiet voice, "Scum, you
had a girl come two days ago when you were manning the ferris wheel. As I remember, you did well, she was really waddling
when she left.

"Feh," Scum said, "It wasn't me. I called her, yeah, but Joshua stole her."

The young man spoke up again, opening his eyes so he could locate Scum and deliver a smug grin her way. "Hey, it's not my
fault, she came to me. Had her eating out of my hands... both figuratively and literally."

"You..." Scum started, but she was stopped.

"Scum, it's not like you're the only one who's short." The large man said, "We're all struggling."

"What!?" Scum yelled, "You ain't strugglin', Bruce, you got other stuff to worry about." She waved her hand in the vague
direction of the fourth person.

The fourth person looked up from what she was doing. Namely, gorging herself on a giant, greasy plate of deep-fried oreos.
She was a thin, statuesque hispanic woman, three hundred and fifty pounds ago. Now, she took up the space of two people on
the bench she was sitting on, that creaked in protest as she shifted all her weight. She was wearing a tight tank top that
exposed the rolls of doughy, tan skin that sat in her generous lap and pressed up against the table. She licked some grease
off her fingers and spoke. "Mi hijo, Bruce doesn't have to worry about me, I can feed myself well." She patted her belly to
emphasize that point.

Scum snorted. "Yeah, but eat so much, while Bruce is busy feedin' some teeny girl, his wife is wastin' away to nothin'."

Bruce turned to his wife. "Dulce, I don't..."

Dulce raised a hand to cut him off. "Don't let her get in your head, Mi Amor. Go call some nice girl, and teach her the joy
of gluttony," She took another bite of her greasy carnival food. "That is, unless I call her first. I've been looking for
an eating buddy..."

Scum coughed and laughed. "It's down to skill, then! Who ever sees anyone first, call them. No cheatin', Joshua."

Joshua stood up and walked over to where the other three were talking. "Fine, I won't steal anyone's girl. It's been a
while since I've won one fair and square, anyway. Those are the hard-earned pounds, you get me?"

"Fine," Bruce said, "Now all we need is someone to come in..."

155331111111.content:
As you waddle (yes, you waddle now), you spy an old fashioned-styled ice cream stand that would fit in well at the turn of the 20th Century. The stand is fairly small compared to others, taking up half as much space as a barbecue stand not too far off, and it has a red and white stripe pattern running across it, like a candy cane. Curiously though, you find that the stand has four flavors listed on the front, a far cry from what you are used to seeing; most places have at least ten. The only options presented are vanilla, chocolate, strawberry, or Neapolitan, the tasty combination of all three.

You debate whether or not to get some, but the fair is so hot and you are still, surprisingly enough, hungry. Perhaps some ice cream could tide you over; it would certainly help to beat the heat.

It is a slow, awkward trek to the stand, as you have to walk around in clothes and weight you are not used to, but you eventually make it over to the stand. When you arrive, you smile at the plump girl working the stand while you try your hardest to rid yourself of the wedgie your panties have made.

"Hi there!" the chipper girl greets you. "What can I do for you today?"

"Let me see..."
155331111111.title: You Can Trust Ice Cream...

choices: Serve me up some strawberry!
How about the chocolate or vanilla?
1553311111111.content:
You have had Neapolitan before and found it too much for your tastes; the combination just does not click for you. If you are going to eat ice cream, you prefer your flavors be kept separate. But if you will not be having the Neapolitan, which will you take? The vanilla and the chocolate both look and smell great, but the strawberry looks quite tantalizing...

"If it helps, I recommend the strawberry," the clerk offers with a grin. "It's made with specially grown strawberries that are so plump and juicy, you won't even believe it!"

You wonder what she meant by 'specially grown', which she seems to notice, as she explains, "I mean they're prepared in an old-fashioned, family recipe kind of way; no chemicals on our fruit!"
1553311111111.title: 3 Flavors...

info.brief_description: Three girls go to the 24/7 Fair and end up stuffing themselves silly until they get fat.
info.description: This is a story about three girls who go to a fair that is open twenty hours a day, seven days a week. The food is loaded with calories and totally free. You can follow the girls seperately or together as a group. Just make sure they get fat by the end of the story. Please try to keep this sensible and clean, but otherwise have fun.
